title: ISic000479. I.Sicily inscription 000479
body:
Facsimile Images

memoriae
Vegelae
infelicissimae
quae ((·)) vixit ((·)) annis
5XXI ((·)) m(ensibus) ((·)) III ((·)) dieb(us) ((·)) XVII
Parthenopeus
coniugi ((·)) dul-
cissimae

Apparatus criticus

text of CIL

Italian translation

Alla memoria della sventurata Vegela che visse ventuno anni tre mesi diciasette giorni. Partenopeo (predispose questo) per l'amatissima coniuge

English translation

In memory of the unfortunate Vegela who lived twenty-one years three months and seventeen days. Parthenopeus (set this up) for his beloved wife

commentary

bibliography

  • VIII 695 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002649
